item.title: Guidance with my experience of making a site using Hugo
item.description: Making Website using Hugo!! I would like to share my experiecne making a website using Hugo. Recently, I had to learn to make a website as a task for the recuirtment process for a club called amFOSS. As I was reading about the task, I thought that it would not be possible for me to do it. I only realized that it was a peice of cake only when I started doing it.

item.title: Taking Inputs in Java
item.description: import java.util.*; public static void main(String[] args){ System.out.println("Hello"); Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in); }
